Text:
*Clears throat*STFU
A.It's CAPTAIN MARVEL, Shazam is the old dude who gave him his powers
B.Superman is weak against magic yes but in reality it's a Tie in terms of true power so it's like asking who's better Batman or Black Panther
C.To go down the list of some shit you wouldn't expect out out straight DC:
Red Hood

All good fucking comics
